badge_template_activities.title: Undertake seven, 'self-paced' on-line learning modules: 1. The Fundamentals of Use-Case Modelling 2. Finding Actors & Use Cases 3. Outlining and slicing Use Cases 4. 953abf5d-37f2-472b-a1f3-63265f31f295.description: Essence is the open standard for defining methods and practices. Essence Certified shows that you understand the Essence kernel and language and are able to use exercises and games to help teams use Essence to improve their delivery.
953abf5d-37f2-472b-a1f3-63265f31f295.name: Essence Certified

issuer.summary: issued by Ivar Jacobson International SA

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the Essence Certified badge have a fundamental understanding of the OMG standard Essence and how to use games to unlock insights into how their teams can understand and improve their practices.
Better Scrum Through Essence 3 day course with exam. Exam pass mark 70% They may have demonstrated this through attendance at the Better Scrum Though Essence course and passing the exam.
Competence may have been demonstrated to the same level as the Better Scrum Through Essence course or higher level and observed and certified by an IJI assessor
